name: Magnate
description:
JUST. ONE. MORE. TAP!

Topping the Rich List is so last year…... now in a first for mobile, you can earn not trillions, but tredecillions and tap your way to glory by becoming the world’s richest Magnate in this new and highly addictive tycoon clicker!

Start at the bottom selling old machine parts and junk droids and... tap, tap, tap your way to your very own cyberpunk empire! Before you know it you’ll be able to hire managers to do the hard graft for you, and with billions banked, you must face the ultimate fat cat dilemma; take the path of GOOD or EVIL in your pursuit of even greater fortune?

Tap your way to septuagintillions (all denominations are entirely accurate, ask any banker), sell up for bonds to supercharge the value of your next business, and pour money into your vaults. We dare you not to get addicted!

Play mini-games to make it rain and boost your incomes, or trade in-game for multipliers to scale your profits off the chart.

Wealth breeds wealth - have you got what takes to rise to the top of the social leaderboards and become the richest Magnate amongst your friends, or even the richest the world has ever seen?

Key features:
- Hire Managers to run your businesses giving you more tapping time
- Choose your path: GOOD or EVIL in your pursuit of mass fortune
- Compete against your friends and the world, top the leaderboard to become the world's richest Magnate
- Sell your businesses for bonds and grow an even more lucrative empire

JUST.ONE.MORE.TAP!
